tool_description: An API enabling your LangChain AI agents to access live financial / investment information, and then take action using tools to access stock broker exchanges.
name: FinChain
title: FinChain

api_list.name: Search for an entity
api_list.description: Search for an entity using company name

api_list.name: Profile Companies
api_list.description: Get a profile of a company using an entity identity.

api_list.name: General search
api_list.description: Find entity ids related to a specific topic.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/company/entity/general/search/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/company/entity/general/search/{keywords}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Retrieve financial reports
api_list.description: Retrieve financial reports for a company using its ticker.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/stock/financials/reports/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/stock/financials/reports/{ticker}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Alternatives
api_list.description: List out potential alternative companies to the ticker's company.

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Live stock lookup
api_list.description: Look up a stock ticker using some keywords.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/stock/lookup/apple"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://finchain.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/stock/lookup/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "finchain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
